summary: An FBI email from August 8, 2019, regarding a summary of Epstein personnel, sent between FBI personnel in New York. The email references an attachment and appears to be part of coordination within the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad.

persons.name: SSA Squad C-20
persons.context: Appears to be the supervisor of the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in FBI New York, referenced in the email signature.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Epstein personnel summary
events.description: An email was sent on August 7, 2019, with an attachment about Epstein personnel, requesting review for accuracy.

events.title: Follow-up email on Epstein personnel
events.description: A follow-up email was sent on August 8, 2019, summarizing that all else is good and referencing ERT #17.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 8, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
The subject is 'Summary of Epstein personnel', indicating FBI focus on identifying individuals associated with Epstein.
The email is from the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in New York, highlighting the nature of the investigation.
Reference to 'ERT #17' suggests coordination with an Evidence Response Team or similar unit.
The email chain shows internal FBI review of information accuracy regarding Epstein associates.
